SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

me.prettyprint.hom.annotations
Annotation Type Id

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Id

Annotation marking the ID property in the POJO. Marking the ID property is required so the object mapper can get/set the ID (Cassandra row key) in the POJO.

Author:
Todd Burruss

Optional Element Summary
 Class<? extends Converter> converter
          The optional converter to use when converting POJO property value to/from byte[].
 

converter

public abstract Class<? extends Converter> converter
The optional converter to use when converting POJO property value to/from byte[]. If not specified, DefaultConverter is used.

Returns:
Class of converter
Default:
me.prettyprint.hom.converters.DefaultConverter.class
